thread.title: Android v6.0 Marshmallow: Will your handset receive the upgrade?
thread.title_full: Android v6.0 Marshmallow: Will your handset receive the upgrade?

author: Deccan
title: Android v6.0 Marshmallow: Will your handset receive the upgrade?
text:
Deccan Chronicle | October 09, 2015, 20.55 pm Android Marshmallow The latest Android operating system Marshmallow v6.0 is here and Motorola has confirmed that almost all of the Moto devices will be receiving the new OS update Even Sony recently rolled out the list of the Xperia handsets that will be receiving the latest operating system upgrade.
Here is a list of all handsets that may get the Marshmallow update. Read through to know if your handset is in the list:
Google Nexus series:
Google LG Nexus 5 (2013) Motorola Nexus 6 (2014) Google Android One: Micromax Canvas A1 Spice Dream Uno Karbonn Sparkle V Lava Iris Pixel V1 Motorola:
2015 Moto X Pure Edition (3rd gen) 2015 Moto X Style (3rd gen) 2015 Moto X Play 2015 Moto G (3rd gen) 2014 Moto X Pure Edition in the US (2nd gen) 2014 Moto X in Latin America, Europe and Asia2 (2nd gen) 2014 Moto G and Moto G with 4G LTE2 (2nd gen) DROID Turbo 2014 Moto MAXX 2014 Moto Turbo Nexus 6 Lenovo:
K3 Note Vibe Shot Vibe P1 Vibe P1M ZUK Z1 HTC:
One M8 One M9 One M9 Plus E9 E9 Plus ME E8 One M8 Eye Butterfly 3 Desire 826 Desire 820 Desire 816 Samsung:
Galaxy Note 5 Galaxy S6 Edge+ Galaxy S6 (S6 Edge) Galaxy A8 Galaxy A7 Galaxy Alpha Galaxy Note 4 Note Edge Galaxy S5 Galaxy A5 Galaxy E series Sony:
Sony Xperia Z5 Sony Xperia Z5 Compact Sony Xperia Z5 Premium Sony Xperia Z4 Tablet Sony Xperia Z3+ Sony Xperia Z3 Sony Xperia Z3 Compact Sony Xperia Z3 Tablet Compact Sony Xperia Z2 Sony Xperia Z2 Tablet Sony Xperia M5 Sony Xperia C5 Ultra Sony Xperia M4 Aqua Sony Xperia C4 LG:
G3 G4 Flex 2 ASUS:
Zenfone 2 series (ZE551ML, ZE550ML, ZE500CL) Zenfone 2 Deluxe (ZE551ML) Zenfone 2 Laser (ZE550KL/ZE601KL) Zenfone Selfie (ZD551KL) Zenfone Zoom Zenfone Go Zenfone Maxx OnePlus:
OnePlus One OnePlus Two Xiaomi:
Mi4 Mi4i Mi3 Redmi 2 Redmi Prime Redmi 1S Redmi Note (3G & 4G) Huawei:
Ascend Mate 7 Ascend Mate S Honor 6 Honor 6 Plus iBerry:
Auxus Prime P8000 Note: The list of smartphones is not a confirmed one and has been predicted by reading trends of previous updates.
